scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=web-app
scripts.build:web: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=web-app
scripts.build:production: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:shared && npm run build:production --workspace=web-app
scripts.tauri:build:release: npm run build:shared && npm run build:tauri --workspace=web-app && tauri build
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf web-app/.next web-app/out web-app/node_modules shared/node_modules shared/dist node_modules src-tauri/target
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=shared && npm run type-check --workspace=web-app
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=shared && npm run lint --workspace=web-app
scripts.release:prepare: npm run clean && npm run build:production && npm run tauri:build:release
scripts.release:github: gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg/*.dmg src-tauri/target/release/bundle/msi/*.msi src-tauri/target/release/bundle/appimage/*.AppImage --title "Ottokode v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "ðŸŽ‰ Ottokode v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") - AI-powered IDE for modern development" --repo tempandmajor/ottokode
